betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oBuild a frame of stone bricks and fill inside with vanilla leaves, right click a gaean keystone placed 7 blocks away using a staff of gaea (prepare two of these setups)

§fThe erebus caves are a weird, really weird, place.
While gravity has a defined direction, there is no sign that the soil either above or below these large caves will ever end.
It almost feels like they are not located on a planet. Rather, these caves feel like they are truly flat.
The powers of witchery definitely play a role in this, but it seems like this place is not even located on a planet.
The insects living in this world seem to be originated by some higher power, since they are not directly able to travel through higher dimensions by themselves.
